metadata.Title: CVE-2022-37609 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Prototype pollution vulnerability in beautify-web js-beautify 1.13.7 via the name variable in options.js.

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine mdeslaur> starting with Ubuntu 22.04, the firefox package is just a script that installs the Firefox snap rodrigo-zaiden> firefox and thunderbird includes jsbeautify code in devtools/

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
